unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Needed big time, especially after the crazy monsoon in Bihar this year. Farmers like Ramlal from my village suffered huge losses. Heard the PM Fasal Bima Yojana payouts are slow though. Anyone had luck claiming after the 20/07/2023 floods? Maybe a Kisan Credit Card is better? Thinking of checking with the ICAR folks at 14:00 hrs on 25/08/2023. Rs. 5000 per acre damage seems too little on 01/01/2024! Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, eh? Needed big time, especially after the crazy monsoon in Bihar this year. Farmers like Ramlal from my village suffered huge losses. Heard the P M Fasal Bima Yojana payouts are slow though. Anyone had luck claiming after the twentieth july two thousand and twenty three floods? Maybe a Kisan Credit Card is better? Thinking of checking with the I C A R folks at two P M on twenty fifth august two thousand and twenty three. Rupee five thousand per acre damage seems too little on first january two thousand and twenty four! Jai Kisan!
